description:
18.24 showfreqs
Convert input audio to video output representing the audio power spectrum.
Audio amplitude is on Y-axis while frequency is on X-axis.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: showfreqs

options.description: Specify size of video. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default is 1024x512.
options.name: size

options.description:
Set display mode. This set how each frequency bin will be represented.

It accepts the following values:

‘line’
‘bar’
‘dot’

Default is bar.
options.name: mode

options.description:
Set amplitude scale.

It accepts the following values:

‘lin’

Linear scale.

‘sqrt’

Square root scale.

‘cbrt’

Cubic root scale.

‘log’

Logarithmic scale.

Default is log.
options.name: ascale

options.description:
Set frequency scale.

It accepts the following values:

‘lin’

Linear scale.

‘log’

Logarithmic scale.

‘rlog’

Reverse logarithmic scale.

Default is lin.
options.name: fscale

options.description:
Set window size. Allowed range is from 16 to 65536.

Default is 2048
options.name: win_size

options.description:
Set windowing function.

It accepts the following values:

‘rect’
‘bartlett’
‘hanning’
‘hamming’
‘blackman’
‘welch’
‘flattop’
‘bharris’
‘bnuttall’
‘bhann’
‘sine’
‘nuttall’
‘lanczos’
‘gauss’
‘tukey’
‘dolph’
‘cauchy’
‘parzen’
‘poisson’
‘bohman’
‘kaiser’

Default is hanning.
options.name: win_func

options.description: Set window overlap. In range [0, 1]. Default is 1, which means optimal overlap for selected window function will be picked.
options.name: overlap

options.description: Set time averaging. Setting this to 0 will display current maximal peaks. Default is 1, which means time averaging is disabled.
options.name: averaging

options.description: Specify list of colors separated by space or by ’|’ which will be used to draw channel frequencies. Unrecognized or missing colors will be replaced by white color.
options.name: colors

options.description:
Set channel display mode.

It accepts the following values:

‘combined’
‘separate’

Default is combined.
options.name: cmode

options.description: Set minimum amplitude used in log amplitude scaler.
options.name: minamp

options.description:
Set data display mode.

It accepts the following values:

‘magnitude’
‘phase’
‘delay’

Default is magnitude.
options.name: data

options.description: Set channels to use when processing audio. By default all are processed.
options.name: channels
